resources.string:
Game Settings can be found in the main startscreen of the game.
Back This will become avaliable all the time with BlackBerry OS update to 10.2 but on 10.1, you must swipe diagonally from right to left on the BOTTOM bezel, making a back gesture.
Saving To save, open the tool box in the MAIN screen of the game and tap on the save icon.

________________

Tips

Make sure you put on your accessories at the start of the game by clicking your player icon in the bottom corner.

You can change settings through the preferences button

To rest, walk to an avaliable bed

Make sure you make a savefile of your game and save through that from time to time. Note, the game DOES quicksave so if you go back to the main page you will return to where you left off by clicking "continue".

________________
